EXTRACTED VALUE: Player-specific moves are astonishing and Isomotion work quite well. The shot stick, free throw mechanics, and team AI needs work though.
Easy to pick up and play.
Castle Crashers is a frequently hilarious old school action game, with nice longevity and an excellent four player co-op mode.
If you're looking for an action RPG with and attractive concept and lasting appeal definitely pick this one up.
Prey offers impressive visuals, a decent story, and high-octane action to bring players the equivalent of an outstanding summer action flick.
The game achieves its core focus, taking you along for a thrilling ride. [Oct 2008, p.103]
No big evolution but it delivers a tempting alternative to mondern combat. [Aug 2008, p.71]
A true frag fest that is destined to become a classic among UT fans.
Being such a long time fan of the series I can honestly say this is the most fun I have had with a Tony Hawk game since the release of "THPS4."
A breathtaking experience but lacking the spark and guile to turn it into a classic. [Christmas 2006, p.68]
NHL is easily the best ice hockey game available - a must for fans. [Dec 2007, p.85]
Whether combat is fast and gruesomely beautiful or at a halt leaving nothing but the scenery to admire, Ninja Gaiden II is presented beautifully.
An action packed blockbuster featuring some of the best elements to be seen on a console, conveniently masking the flaws.
By far the worst thing about Driver is its inability to really draw me into its universe.
Madden NFL 09 is far from a perfect game but at the end of the day this one is the best versions in its 20 year run.
Somehow, the developers managed to take two distinct and different genres and blend them together into a seamless and wholly entertaining experience.
The Darkness offers up just about everything we have come to desire in a FPS and has wrapped the package up nicely with a few neat touches of its own.
The game is very accessible to veterans and newbies alike, and it offers a great single and multiplayer experience.
Volition put forth a game worthy of challenging GTA of its crown for king of the sandbox.
